Articles.Content:
Just playing around on www.nonameships.pw (6702) when I realize: This is boring without others...

I want some people to play with regularly on DarkMultiPlayer for the server above. This could be battles, space station construction, or colonizing the universe under an iron fist. Whatever floats your boat. Message me

Hello.

I'm just leaving this here so you have a way to reach me if the server happens to be down. Use PM's as necessary.

P.S. You just made me register. Congratulations.

I can't delete this so, I'm editing it to this message ha ha

Edited December 30, 2014 by Not-A-Rocket-Scientist
Do you have a TeamSpeak server? If not you should look in to getting one as it is difficult to type a chat when flying
